EmailTemplate.name: SOI full report available
EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partner Independent Workforce Index Now Available
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for indicating interest in learning more about MBO Partners Independent Workforce Index and journey to highlight the state of independent work in America.
We are pleased to share a link to the full report (http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO%20Partners%20Independent%20Workforce%20Index%202011.pdf) and data slides (http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO%20Partners%20Independent%20Workforce%20Index%20%20Key%20Findings%20Summary.pdf), now available at our study site (http://info.mbopartners.com/stateofindependence).
Do share the news with others in your network by inviting them to visit our study site, and join our Facebook community (http://www.facebook.com/pages/The-State-of-Independence/126879364075991).
MBO Partners The State of Independence Team Comments? Feedback? Email us at: soi@mbopartners.com
